metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33797 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer-overflow in jsdtoa.c in Artifex MuJS in versions 1.0.1 to 1.1.1. Aninteger overflow happens when js_strtod() reads in floating point exponent,which leads to a buffer overflow in the pointer *d.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmujs1 - 1.1.3-3
mujs - 1.1.3-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mujs package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.3-3').
